ygData.subject: Re: Threatening
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats what I did, killed orcs by the groves, now the humans like me....well tollerate me, they still refuse to do business with me, but at least they don t try
ygData.messageBody:
Thats what I did, killed orcs by the groves, now the humans like me....well
tollerate me, they still refuse to do business with me, but at least they
don't try to kill me any more.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steven [mailto:ickster@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 7:13 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Threatening
>
>
> From: "Steven" <ickster@...>
>
> Any evil races out there who's successfully changed their faction
> with the human guards around Freeport? I've been killing orcs
> left and right but guards and innkeeps still threatening to me.
>
> I was hopping to at least be to a point where I can walk in and
> hope on boat if I needed to. Of course I'd probably have to deal
> with guards in other continents.
>
> Any ideas?
> ---
> Numok lvl 12 Ogre Warrior
